languageKey.label: Haikus
Haikus are short Japanese poems that follow a very strict structure.
Use this field to hide a haiku that should not be published.
Title of the haiku
Text of the haiku
Enter the text of your haiku in this field.

The structure of the haiku is very stric. It is comprised of three "lines". Those "lines" must be made of a very precise number of "syllables":
- 5 for the first line - 7 for the second line - 5 for the third line
Storage file
Name of the file where the text of the haiku will be stored.

The file will be located in "fileadmin/static". It must already exist and be writeable.
The file must contain the ###TYPO3_STATICFILE_EDIT### marker twice. The text of the haiku will be written between these two markers. Anything before and after that is ignored.
Choose a season from the list or create a new season.
